mapper.select: SELECT CONTESTTYPE FROM CONTEST WHERE MEMBEREMAIL = #{email} AND PAYED = FALSE
SELECT ID,TITLE,CONTESTTYPE,COMPANY,SERVICEINFO,SECTOR,IDEA,BRIEFING FROM CONTEST WHERE MEMBEREMAIL = #{value} AND PAYED = FALSE

SELECT ID, CONTEST.TITLE, CONTEST.CONTESTTYPE, MEMBER.NICKNAME, CONTEST.COMPANY, CONTEST.SERVICEINFO, CONTEST.VIEWS, DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE, CURDATE()), CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE, CONTEST.SECONDPRIZE, CONTEST.THIRDPRIZE, CONTEST.HIGHLIGHT,CONTEST.FULLPRIZE, CONTEST.PAYTYPE FROM CONTEST, MEMBER WHERE CONTEST.MEMBEREMAIL = MEMBER.EMAIL AND ID = #{value}

SELECT CONTEST.ID, CONTEST.TITLE, COUNT(WORK.CONTEST_ID), DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE,CURDATE()) FROM CONTEST LEFT JOIN WORK ON CONTEST.ID = WORK.CONTEST_ID WHERE CONTEST.ENDDATE > CURDATE() GROUP BY CONTEST.ID
ORDER BY COUNT(WORK.CONTEST_ID), DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE,CURDATE()) DESC, CONTEST.ID DESC
ORDER BY CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE DESC, CONTEST.ID DESC
ORDER BY CONTEST.STARTDATE DESC, CONTEST.ID DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONTEST
WHERE ENDDATE > CURDATE()
WHERE CURDATE() > CONTEST.ENDDATE AND WINNER IS NULL
WHERE WINNER != 0
SELECT ID, TITLE,CONTESTTYPE, IMGURL FROM CONTEST WHERE ENDDATE > CURDATE() AND PAYED = 1 ORDER BY CONTEST.SHOW DESC, CONTEST.STARTDATE DESC

SELECT CONTEST.ID, CONTEST.TITLE, CONTEST.CONTESTTYPE, MEMBER.NICKNAME, CONTEST.COMPANY, CONTEST.SERVICEINFO, CONTEST.VIEWS, DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE, CURDATE()), CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE, CONTEST.SECONDPRIZE, CONTEST.THIRDPRIZE, CONTEST.HIGHLIGHT,CONTEST.FULLPRIZE, CONTEST.PAYTYPE FROM CONTEST, MEMBER WHERE CONTEST.MEMBEREMAIL = MEMBER.EMAIL AND CONTEST.ENDDATE > CURDATE() AND PAYED = 1 ORDER BY CONTEST.SHOW DESC, CONTEST.STARTDATE DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}

SELECT CONTEST.ID, CONTEST.TITLE, CONTEST.CONTESTTYPE, MEMBER.NICKNAME, CONTEST.COMPANY, CONTEST.SERVICEINFO, CONTEST.VIEWS, DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE, CURDATE()), CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE, CONTEST.SECONDPRIZE, CONTEST.THIRDPRIZE, CONTEST.HIGHLIGHT,CONTEST.FULLPRIZE, CONTEST.PAYTYPE FROM CONTEST, MEMBER WHERE CONTEST.MEMBEREMAIL = MEMBER.EMAIL AND CURDATE() > CONTEST.ENDDATE AND WINNER IS NULL AND PAYED = 1 ORDER BY CONTEST.SHOW DESC, CONTEST.ENDDATE DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}

SELECT CONTEST.ID, CONTEST.TITLE, CONTEST.CONTESTTYPE, MEMBER.NICKNAME, CONTEST.COMPANY, CONTEST.SERVICEINFO, CONTEST.VIEWS, DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.STARTDATE), CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE, CONTEST.SECONDPRIZE, CONTEST.THIRDPRIZE, CONTEST.HIGHLIGHT, CONTEST.FULLPRIZE, CONTEST.PAYTYPE FROM CONTEST, MEMBER WHERE CONTEST.MEMBEREMAIL = MEMBER.EMAIL AND WINNER != 0 AND PAYED = 1 ORDER BY CONTEST.STARTDATE DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
